amendment.description: Amendment requires the Secretary of the Interior to consult with the California Governor and the State legislature before leasing any areas off the coast of California.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part C of House Report 112-616 to add a new section which provides that in determining the areas off the coast of California to be made available for leasing under this Act, the Secretary of the Interior shall consult with the Governor and legislature of the State of California.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Richardson amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A003) offered by Ms. Richardson.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Richardson amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
